sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>dragon</radical> radical is the same as this kanji, which is <kanji>dragon</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Not to <kanji>dragon</kanji> with it, but make sure you know your radicals so you know your kanji!
readingMnemonic: Imagine a <kanji>dragon</kanji>. You are talking to it, which is already pretty strange, but as you're talking, he turns into the Street Fighter character <reading>Ryuu</reading> (<ja>りゅう</ja>).
readingInfo: Then imagine after his transformation he attacks you using his Street Fighter moves. "Hadouken!"
